item.title: Pope Leo visits Istanbul's Blue Mosque
item.description: It is the first time Leo has attended a Muslim place of worship since he took up the papacy in May.

item.title: Budget 2025: What's the best and worst that could happen for Labour?
item.description: Three days in, after a tax U-turn and partial climbdown on workers' rights, Laura Kuenssberg looks at what impact Budget week might have.

item.title: Piastri cuts Norris' title lead with Qatar GP sprint race win
item.description: Oscar Piastri cuts McLaren team-mate Lando Norris' championship lead by two points with victory in the sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix.

item.title: Piastri cuts Norris' title lead with Qatar GP sprint race win
item.description: Oscar Piastri cuts McLaren team-mate Lando Norris' championship lead by two points with victory in the sprint race at the Qatar Grand Prix.

item.title: Manchester to London train to run without passengers for five months
item.description: The 07:00 GMT train will only carry staff to London following a decision by the rail regulator.
